price: Dájúdájú òhun ni igi kan tí ó máa hù jáde láti ìdí iná Jẹhīm.
arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٞ تَخۡرُجُ فِيٓ أَصۡلِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: innahā shajaratun takhruju fī aṣli al-jaḥīmi
